## ‚ú® v2.0.2
* **Global Macro Flavor Text**: GMs can right-click any global macro in the action menu to set custom flavor text. The text appears as a tooltip for all players.
* **Personal Macro Deletion Fix**: Fixed a bug where deleting a personal macro from a category would revert after page refresh.
* ‚ö†Ô∏è If a player has already set personal flavor text on a macro, it takes priority over the GM's global flavor. Clear the personal override to see the global text.

---

## üêõ Hotfix v2.0.1
* **OBS Overlay URL Fix**: Restored missing overlay.html bridge page ‚Äî fixes "Cannot GET" errors when using overlay URLs.
* **V12 Compatibility ‚Äî Shift Key Detection**: Fixed isModifierActive crash on V12.
* **V12 Compatibility ‚Äî DialogV2 Callbacks**: Fixed dialog.element.querySelector crash in V12 for editResource, editSpellSlots, editMacro, and UpdateNotifier dialogs.
* **Update Notification Scroll**: Long patch notes no longer overflow the dialog window.

---

## ‚ö†Ô∏è World Backup Recommended
This is a major update. Please **back up your world** before updating.

---

## ‚ú® Major Update v2.0.0
### üé® Custom Theme Engine
* **Full Custom Theme**: Stack multiple image layers on portraits and card backgrounds with per-layer Z-Index, position, scale, rotation, opacity, and blend mode controls.
* **Action Menu Layers & Colors**: Fully customize every Action Menu element ‚Äî buttons, headers, tabs, sidebars, list items, and more.
* **Element Image Defaults**: Set custom images for bar frames, fills, backgrounds, dots, and number backgrounds globally.
* **Per-Attribute Image Overrides**: Override element images per attribute with independent position, scale, and rotation.
* **Card Size & Scale**: Configure card width/height globally and per-actor. Per-actor scale multiplier for individual sizing.
* **Theme Export / Import**: Export your entire Custom Theme as a `.zip` (colors, layers, images, conditions, sounds). Import on any world ‚Äî images are automatically uploaded and paths rewritten.

### üñ• Compact Mode
* Cards collapse into themed portrait thumbnails and expand on hover.
* Each theme (Iron, Glass, Fantasy, Medieval, Cyberpunk, Custom) has a unique compact shape.
* Toggle via `Shift+C` or config checkbox. Per-actor override: Always Collapsed / Always Expanded / Use Global.

### üé≤ Stat Click-to-Roll
* Clicking a rollable stat on the HUD triggers the dice roll directly.
* **PF2e**: Saves, Skills, Perception, Initiative. **DnD5e**: Ability Checks, Saving Throws, Skills, Initiative.
* Alt+Click opens the value editor on any stat. Rollable stats show a dotted underline on hover.

### üì∫ Broadcast Account for OBS
* Designate a Foundry user as a dedicated broadcast account ‚Äî overlay mode activates automatically on login.
* GM can switch the displayed actor live; changes apply to the broadcast client in real-time.

### üîß And More
* Category Visibility Filter (show/hide categories by actor type or identity)
* Per-Attribute Text Colors, Global Name/Portrait/Card Format controls
* Portrait Frame Layer, Per-Badge Conditional Images
* Independent Number/Label Positioning, End Turn Button Position

announcement.content: Major update! Back up your world first. Adds Custom Theme layers, Compact Mode, Stat Click-to-Roll, Theme Export/Import, and much more.
